title: 79. In Loving Memory of When I Gave a S**t - LOLO
text: I love this album so far, and I can't wait to hear the rest! ❤️ Biography Born: December 27, 1987 in Jackson, TN Genre: Pop Years Active: '00s, '10s LOLO is the performing name of Jackson, Tennessee native Lauren Pritchard. A singer from a young age, Pritchard moved to Los Angeles as a teenager hoping to break into the music business. She eventually got her first big break in musical theater in the role of Ilse in the Broadway production Spring Awakening. Hoping to parlay her success into a pop music career, she relocated to the U.K. and signed a deal with Universal/Island Records. Working with acclaimed British songwriter/producer Eg White,... Top Albums and Songs by LOLO 1.
